short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly create payment links for your customers right inside Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instamojo is the easiest way to sell online and collect payments for your products & services in India - with just a simple payment link. 

This is the official gmail extension by Instamojo that helps:

★ Create a new payment link directly from Gmail
★ Search your existing payment links
★ Send your existing payment links to customers via gmail
★ Send emails from your own gmail account, with embedded payment links

Instamojo helps small businesses to sell, manage and grow their business online by providing multiple services including payments, invoices, store, GST compliance and more utility apps.
